# Get List by Name

# Description

Retrieve the list details by providing an email address.

# Untitled Section

# Configuration

Account - Select the account from the drop-down list or enter a custom account
            ID. This field supports String type input.Name - The name of the list. This field supports String type
            input.









* List - Automatically generated output variable.
* List ID - The list ID. Automatically generated output variable.
